rubenchristoffer.hetty

Class HTTPRawPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • rubenchristoffer.hetty.HTTPRawPacket

  • public class HTTPRawPacket
extends java.lang.Object
    Raw HTTP packet. This means that header part of packet and the body is split and is in byte form. Header portion contains trailing CRLF as well.
    Author:
    Ruben Christoffer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a new HTTPRawPacket.

      java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream getHeader()
      Gets header.
      byte[] toByteArray()

      • HTTPRawPacket

        public HTTPRawPacket(java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream header,
                     java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream body)
        Creates a new HTTPRawPacket.
        Parameters:
        header - is the header stream containing header bytes for this packet
        body - is the body stream containing body bytes for this packet

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if header or body is null
